title: Super high ping for no reason
body: Hi, today for no reason my ms got too high. I use ethernet and i hadn't had any other programm opened at that time(plus wifi was off so nothing could mess up with the ms). From my normal 70-80 ping i got 3000+.Is there any issue with the server?Too bad for me i had a perfect ranked game and suddenly i was useless cause of ping.

replies.body: I haven't seen any issues with the server, but I don't have a lot of visibility over EU.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for these games, there could be packet loss causing this.  Let me know what you find.

Thank u for your reply,it runs smoothly now,maybe it was a issue of my internet service provider,either way the ms instability occured right after the new patch so i was wandering if i wasnt the only one with the same problem.
